name: Power Attack
description: Make a single Strike that deals extra damage if it hits.

name: Shield Block
description: Raise a shield to block damage with hardness value.

name: Assurance (Lore)
description: Take 10 + proficiency on a chosen skill without rolling.

name: Toughness
description: Gain extra HP and reduced dying condition threshold.

name: Diehard
description: You die at dying 5 instead of dying 4.

name: Student of the Canon
description: You studied holy texts and the practices of your faith.

name: Streetwise
description: Use Society to Gather Information about criminal underworld.

name: Shield Bash
description: Use your shield offensively in combat.

name: Battle Medicine
description: Heal an ally in combat with Medicine skill.

name: Combat Reflexes
description: Make multiple reactions for attacks of opportunity each round.
